title: PEcAn Package for Integration of the GDAY Model
text: can install development version PEcAn.GDAY r-universe like : can install directly GitHub remotes package like :
code: # Enable repository from pecanproject options(repos = c(   pecanproject = 'https://pecanproject.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org')) # Download and install PEcAn.GDAY in R install.packages('PEcAn.GDAY') library(remotes) install_github('pecanproject/pecan',  subdir = "models/gday")

title: met2model.GDAY — met2model.GDAY
text: Function convert NetCDF met files PEcAn-CF format GDAY met driver files. function R wrapper python script "generate_forcing_data.py" inst/ folder. python script supports arguments generate sub-daily (30 min) weather data well soil temperature 6 day running mean. arguments hard-coded function generate daily GDAY files without soil temperature.

title: met2model.GDAY — met2model.GDAY
code: met2model.GDAY(   in.path,   in.prefix,   outfolder,   start_date,   end_date,   overwrite = FALSE,   verbose = FALSE,   ... )

title: met2model.GDAY — met2model.GDAY
text: .path location disk inputs stored .prefix prefix input output files outfolder location disk outputs stored start_date start date data downloaded (use year part date) end_date end date data downloaded (use year part date) overwrite existing files overwritten verbose function verbose ... additional arguments, currently ignored

title: PEcAn.GDAY 1.7.5
text: model2netcdf.GDAY longer writes separate <year>.nc.var files every year output. Use PEcAn.utils::nc_write_varfiles() create needed.
